desc: Modern markdown editor application with built-in ChatGPT extension.

features.title: Features
features.desc: Many features make your writing easier.

feature1.title: Built-in ChatGpt
feature1.desc: Currently supports one-click export of conversations, making chatgpt your smart assistant.

feature2.title: Super lightweight
feature2.desc: linebyline is based on tauri, which ensures ultra-lightweight and fast performance experience.

feature3.title: High availability
feature3.desc: linebyline uses the remirror editor, which not only provides high scalability, but also has a great editing experience. And, linebyline supports multiple editing modes, such as dual, wysiyg.

summary.title: Try the Alpha version
summary.desc: Currently linebyline is in Alpha version, welcome to experience it.
